citations.narrative:
The HVAC air filter and grill in the ferret building are in need of cleaning. The filter itself is all dark grey with dirt except for
the very edges which are still the usual white. The grill covering the filter is dirty and sticky with dust and hairs adhered to
it. Dirty air filters can lead to unclean air and overwork the HVAC unit such that it no longer works efficiently. The facility
shall ensure that the HVAC filter and grill are kept clean in order to protect the animals. Correct by March 17, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility/IACUC representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
The HVAC air filter and grill in the ferret building are in need of cleaning. The filter itself is all dark grey with dirt except for 
the very edges which are still the usual white. The grill covering the filter is dirty and sticky with dust and hairs adhered to 
it. Dirty air filters can lead to unclean air and overwork the HVAC unit such that it no longer works efficiently. The facility 
shall ensure that the HVAC filter and grill are kept clean in order to protect the animals. Correct by March 17, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility/IACUC representative. 
 
End Section
